Item.Value: [Text:I hear you're an artisan right? That sounds so much more interesting than what I do. Do you enjoy it?][Default][Name:1]
[Text:Hey, $Name$. You ever have one of those days where you just feel like you can't do anything right? Yeah. Hope your day is going better at least.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
[Text:What? I haven't done anything to deserve this. Thank you.][Name:Gift]
[Text:This is!? No. how did you get this? I don't... I can't... Really? Thank you so much!][Name:Collection]

[Text:My mother used to tell me stories of monsters that came out when it was raining. I know she just made them up but, sometimes, I can't help but wonder, you know?][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
[Text:Brr, I hope you've got some warm clothing on today. I always make $NPC_14$ a cup of tea on days like this.][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|1]
